testCase.description: Verify that the submit button triggers the correct action.
Verify the "Submit" button is clickable and performs the expected action.
Verify that the "Submit" button changes appearance when hovered over.
Verify the "Cancel" button is clickable and performs the expected action.
Verify that the "Cancel" button changes appearance when hovered over.
Verify the input field with placeholder "Enter your email" accepts valid input.
Verify that the input field with placeholder "Enter your email" displays an error for invalid input.
Verify the input field with placeholder "Enter your password" accepts valid input.
Verify that the input field with placeholder "Enter your password" displays an error for invalid input.
Verify that the checkbox labeled "I agree to the terms" can be checked and unchecked.
Verify that the checkbox labeled "I agree to the terms" is required before form submission.
Verify that the dropdown menu with options "Option 1, Option 2" allows selection.
Verify that the dropdown menu closes when an option is selected.
Verify that the link labeled "Forgot Password?" redirects to the correct page.
Verify that the link labeled "Forgot Password?" opens in a new tab (if applicable).
Verify that the image with alt text "Company Logo" loads correctly.
Verify that the image with alt text "Company Logo" is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes.
Verify that the form with ID "loginForm" has a submit button.
Verify that the form with ID "loginForm" validates all required fields before submission.
Verify that all UI elements are accessible via keyboard navigation.
Verify that the page uses ARIA roles for accessibility.
Verify that all images have meaningful alt attributes for screen readers.
Verify that the layout is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes.
Verify that the page maintains proper alignment and spacing across all devices.
Verify that the page includes a viewport meta tag for responsive design.
Verify that all forms have proper validation attributes.
Verify that all links have valid href attributes and do not lead to broken pages.
